title: kutesocial
description: KuteSocial is your own customizable platform merging dynamic profiles, blogging, and social features in one space. Explore advanced theming, enjoy open-source development under AGPLv3, and know your privacy is a top priority. Claim your preferred username early, join the alpha, and help shape a fresh, user-driven community built around genuine expression. Connect, share, and express yourself in a supportive space.
